item.title: OXY
item.description: score:87 Chances: Occidental Petroleum receiving hundreds of millions of dollars in grants for a carbon capture project from the U.S. Department of Energy indicates potential growth opportunities in the energy transition sector. Berkshire Hathaway’s significant ownership of Occidental Petroleum’s shares, approximately 25%, showcases confidence from a prominent investor.
